languages.text: All the Navigator's attacks inflict additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>. The Navigator's enemies must remain in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}.

languages.text: 导航者所有的攻击都会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。导航者的敌人必须在导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内。

traits.locale_text: 导航者所有的攻击都会造成额外伤害，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。导航者的敌人必须在导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内。

languages.text: Все атаки навигатора наносят дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g}</u>. Противники навигатора должны оставаться в зоне его {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}.
languages.original_text: All the Navigator's attacks inflict additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>. The Navigator's enemies must remain in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все атаки навигатора наносят дополнительный урон, равный <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g}</u>. Противники навигатора должны оставаться в {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне его видимости{/g}.

Все атаки навигатора наносят дополнительный урон, равный <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g}</u>. Противники навигатора должны оставаться в {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне его видимости{/g}.

languages.text: 航宙士の攻撃はすべて、<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}に等しい追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負わせる。</u>航宙士の敵は{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線内{/g}に留まらなければならない。
languages.original_text: All the Navigator's attacks inflict additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>. The Navigator's enemies must remain in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の攻撃は全て、<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}に等しい追加ダメージを負わせる</u>。航宙士の敵は{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}に留まらなければならない。

languages.text: Todos los ataques del navegante infligen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional igual a su <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}</u>. Los enemigos de la navegante deben permanecer en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}.
languages.original_text: All the Navigator's attacks inflict additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>. The Navigator's enemies must remain in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los ataques del navegante infligen daño adicional igual a su <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}</u>. Los enemigos de la navegante deben permanecer en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}.

languages.text: Alle Angriffe des Navigators verursachen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} entsprechend seines <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>. Die Feinde des Navigators müssen in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} bleiben.
languages.original_text: All the Navigator's attacks inflict additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>. The Navigator's enemies must remain in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Alle Angriffe des Navigators verursachen Zusatzschaden entsprechend seines <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>. Die Feinde des Navigators müssen in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} bleiben.

languages.text: Toutes les attaques du navigateur infligent un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal à son <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g}</u>. Les ennemis du navigateur doivent se trouver dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les attaques du navigateur infligent un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal à son <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g}</u>. languages.text: Rotacı'nın tüm saldırıları, <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İRA{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Rotacı'nın düşmanları, onun {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattı{/g} içinde kalmalıdır.
